summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 6.5°C) and outside temperature (down 6.1°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 17%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 16698 lux) and cloud levels (up 514 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 15769 lux), the amount of wind (up 20 miles), cloud levels (up 325 m), and outside humidity (down 9%) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, low humidity will be noticeable and light winds will prevail. Chance of light rain, fog or low cloud is expected, and low sunlight due to cloudy or overcast skies. Little change in the weather.
